tool_description: Compares actual land uses against permitted zoning classifications to identify compliance issues and violations.

zoning_districts.description: List of zoning district codes to analyze

actual_land_uses.description: List of observed land use types

include_nonconforming.description: Whether to flag legal nonconforming uses as violations

severity_filter.description: Minimum violation severity to report: minor, moderate, major

error_messages: Invalid zoning districts: One or more zoning district codes are not recognized for this jurisdiction.
Invalid land uses: One or more land use types are not in the standard classification system.
Invalid jurisdiction: The specified jurisdiction code is not found in the database.
Invalid severity filter: Use one of [minor, moderate, major].
Analysis date in future: Analysis date cannot be in the future.
usage: Provide arrays of zoning districts and actual land uses along with jurisdiction code and analysis date. Set include_nonconforming and severity_filter to customize violation reporting.

total_violations.description: Total number of compliance violations found

high_priority_count.description: Number of high-priority violations requiring immediate attention
